sentence.Network_en: Within quarter of an hour the coldness of the night had gone.
sentence.Network_cn: 不到一刻钟，夜晚的寒气就一扫而光。

sentence.Network_en: We spent the better part of an hour searching for her.

sentence.Network_en: I've got to go in a quarter of an hour.
sentence.Network_cn: 一刻钟以后我就得走了.
